    VLCD-CAP-GLD-RGB Display

    Price: $100.00
    Ships within 4 working days

    The VLCD-CAP-GLD-RGB is a 7” LCD 800 x 480 (WVGA) RGB display with a capacitive touch panel (I2C) and video parallel RGB interface.

    Featuring:

    • 7″ LCD 800 x 480 (WVGA)
    • Capacitive touch panel (I2C)
    • Video parallel RGB interface

    Compatible products:

    • VAR-6ULCustomBoard
    Product specification
